[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 1,
            column: 1,
            position: 0,
        },
    ),
    Echo(
        EchoStatement {
            echo: Span {
                line: 3,
                column: 1,
                position: 7,
            },
            values: [
                Cast(
                    CastExpression {
                        cast: Span {
                            line: 3,
                            column: 6,
                            position: 12,
                        },
                        kind: String,
                        value: Variable(
                            SimpleVariable(
                                SimpleVariable {
                                    span: Span {
                                        line: 3,
                                        column: 15,
                                        position: 21,
                                    },
                                    name: "$VAR",
                                },
                            ),
                        ),
                    },
                ),
            ],
            ending: Semicolon(
                Span {
                    line: 3,
                    column: 19,
                    position: 25,
                },
            ),
        },
    ),
]
